Title: You hear about the kid who put in $500 into a memecoin and made 100k, but you don't hear about the hundreds who put $1000 and are left with $0.1
Body:
You hear about the kid who put in $500 into a memecoin and made 100k, but you don't hear about the hundreds who put $1000 and are left with $0.1

You also don't hear about the guys who put $10,000 but cant cash out because these memecoins have no liquidity.

Don't beat yourself up for missing out.

Survivorship bias is a dangerous thing.
Author: jonbristow
Comments: ['You also donâ€™t hear about me turning my $20 into $21.04 ðŸ˜Ž', "You also don't hear about the early Bitcoin investors who have already made millions probably because they have better things to do. Most of us are still here posting because we haven't reached our life changing goals yet."]
